text: Barba amarilla (Spanish for "yellow beard") may refer to: * Bothrops asper, or the terciopelo, a venomous pitviper species found in Central and northern South America * Bothrops atrox, or the common lancehead, a venomous pitviper species found in tropical lowlands of northern South America east of the Andes Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Barba amarilla
